courses.title: Introduction to Web Development
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

courses.title: Advanced React Development
courses.description: Master React hooks, context, and advanced patterns

courses.title: Python for Data Science
courses.description: Learn Python programming for data analysis and machine learning

courses.title: Digital Marketing Masterclass
courses.description: Complete guide to digital marketing strategies and tools

lessons.title: Getting Started with HTML
lessons.description: Introduction to HTML elements and structure
lessons.content: In this lesson, you'll learn the basics of HTML, including tags, elements, attributes, and document structure. We'll cover semantic HTML and best practices for creating accessible web pages.

lessons.title: CSS Basics
lessons.description: Learn how to style your web pages with CSS
lessons.content: Discover the power of CSS styling. Learn about selectors, properties, the box model, flexbox, and responsive design fundamentals.

lessons.title: JavaScript Introduction
lessons.content: Learn JavaScript fundamentals including variables, data types, functions, loops, and DOM manipulation. Start building interactive web applications.

lessons.title: React Hooks Deep Dive
lessons.description: Master useState, useEffect, and custom hooks
lessons.content: Deep dive into React Hooks. Learn how to use useState for state management, useEffect for side effects, and create your own custom hooks.

lessons.title: State Management with Context
lessons.description: Learn to manage global state with React Context API
lessons.content: Master the React Context API for managing global application state. Learn when to use Context vs prop drilling and best practices for context providers.

lessons.title: Performance Optimization
lessons.description: Optimize your React applications for better performance
lessons.content: Learn React performance optimization techniques including memoization, lazy loading, code splitting, and profiling with React DevTools.

lessons.title: Python Basics
lessons.content: Learn Python fundamentals including syntax, data types, control structures, functions, and object-oriented programming basics.

lessons.title: NumPy and Pandas
lessons.description: Data manipulation with NumPy and Pandas libraries
lessons.content: Master NumPy for numerical computing and Pandas for data manipulation. Learn to work with arrays, DataFrames, and perform data analysis.

lessons.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
lessons.description: Introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms
lessons.content: Learn machine learning fundamentals including supervised and unsupervised learning, classification, regression, and model evaluation.

lessons.title: SEO Fundamentals
lessons.description: Learn the basics of Search Engine Optimization
lessons.content: Master SEO fundamentals including keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO, and link building strategies.

lessons.title: Social Media Marketing
lessons.content: Learn to create effective social media marketing campaigns across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

lessons.title: Content Marketing Strategy
lessons.description: Build a successful content marketing strategy
lessons.content: Learn to create, distribute, and promote valuable content that attracts and retains your target audience.

faqs.question: How do I enroll in a course?
faqs.answer: Simply browse our course catalog, select the course you're interested in, and click the 'Enroll' button. You'll need to create an account or sign in first.

faqs.question: Can I access courses on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our platform is fully responsive and works seamlessly on all devices including smartphones and tablets.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all courses. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.

faqs.question: Are there any prerequisites for courses?
faqs.answer: Prerequisites vary by course. Check the course details page for specific requirements and recommended prior knowledge.

faqs.question: How long do I have access to a course?
faqs.answer: Once you enroll in a course, you have lifetime access to all course materials and future updates.
